On his official blog, Mr Zahi Hawass , wrote: I have said that if the Egyptian Museum is safe, Egypt is safe. However, I am now concerned Egypt is not safe. But he later added:`` Not a single thing has been thrown at the museum by the thousands of protesters in Tahrir Square, because these people do not want to damage their cultural heritage.''

George W. Bush concludeerde echter dat Abu Ghraib niet zou verdwijnen door mijn vertrek en hij had liever dat ik het probleem zou behandelen.
